author: Simon Difford
description: Absinthe adds a liquorice note to this spirit-forward cognac-based cocktail.
name: Tremblement de Terre (Earthquake)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
20 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
